description: Detects logon events that have characteristics of events generated during an attack with RottenPotato and the like
author: @SBousseaden
Florian Roth
name: RottenPotato Like Attack Pattern
query: (winlog.channel:"Security" AND winlog.event_id:"4624" AND winlog.event_data.LogonType:"3" AND winlog.event_data.TargetUserName:"ANONYMOUS LOGON" AND source.domain:"-" AND source.ip:("127.0.0.1" OR "::1"))
